summary: I WAS TRAVELING ON THE NEW JERSEY TURNPIKE, HEADING NORTH BOUND IN THE MIDDLE LANE.  I FELT A SUDDEN THUMP AND THEN NOTICE THE MINI VAN STARTED TO REV UP TO 4500 - 5000 RPM, WHICH IT HAS NEVER DONE.  I PULL TO THE EMERGENCY PULL OFF.  THE CAR WOULD TURN ON AND SHIFT HOWEVER, IT WOULD NOT MOVE IN FORWARD OR REVERSE.
